ModMetaData.name: RMC012.另一个世界的草更红了
ModMetaData.author: AllyJamy
ModMetaData.description:
合集地址：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html
This is a editied version of the original. Vegitation is less vibrant and less likley to blind you. It has less magenta, and a lot more red.
这是原版的改进后版本。红色变得更加柔和，不会给人刺眼的感觉。
Changes the Rimworld into a planet that orbits a red dwarf. The photosynthesis makes it so the plant life has a very different colour pallet.
把边缘世界变成一颗围绕红矮星运转的行星。光合作用使植物的颜色发生了变化。
-Most biomes are changed to a more reddish colour. -The planet map has been recoloured to match the biome change.
-大多数生物群落都变得更红。 -行星地图已重新着色，以配合生物群落的变化。
For those who are want a more vibrant "alien" enviroment.
对于那些想要更有活力的外星环境的人来说，这个MOD是不二之选！
Works well with Makaru's "Fertile planet" mod.
